'''23w13a''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.20]], released on March 29, 2023,<ref>{{snap|23w13a|March 29, 2023}}</ref> which adds the ability to change the GUI scale by holding {{key|Ctrl}} and scrolling the mouse wheel, and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''{{ItemLink|Raiser armor trim}} and {{ItemLink|wayfinder armor trim}}'''
* Changed textures, were offset by one pixel.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Sniffer]]'''
* No longer drops a [[moss block]].

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* "A Seedy Place" is now granted when planting [[pitcher pod]]s.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* GUI can be scaled on the "Video Settings" screen by holding {{key|Ctrl}} and scrolling the mouse wheel.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added <code>pitcher_crop</code> to the <code>#crops</code> block tag.
* Added <code>potted_torchflower</code> to the <code>#flower_pots</code> block tag.
* Added <code>pitcher_plant</code> to the <code>#tall_flowers</code> block and item tags.
